sections.title: Symptoms
content: • When trying to enter play mode, I am receiving the error below:

warning CS0108: `___' hides inherited member `___'. Use the new keyword
if hiding was intended

sections.title: Cause
content: The CS0108 warning is displayed when a variable was declared with the same name as a variable in a base class, but does not use the new keyword.

warning CS0108: `PixelPerfect.camera' hides inherited member
`UnityEngine.Component.camera'. Use the new keyword if hiding was
intended

sections.title: Resolution
content: To remove the CS0108 warning, you will need to either add the new keyword to the variable being declared:
Alternatively, you can change the variable's identifier to avoid confusion with collaborators as in this example:
